data.question: What is the melting point of 2-alkyl-4,7-dibromobenzotriazole 3?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of dipotassium [2-(heptadecan-9-yl)-2H-benzotriazole]-4,7-bis(trifluoroborate) 4?
What is the decomposition temperature of polymer P1?
What solvent was used for spin-coating the semiconductors P1 and P2?
What is the electron mobility of polymer P1 when using Au electrodes?
What method was used to measure the thermal transition behavior of polymers P1 and P2?
What is the purpose of adding LiOH to the Suzuki polycondensation reaction for synthesizing polymer P1?
data.answer: LiOH may help in hydrolyzing the trifluoroborate to the boronic acid, improving the reaction.

data.question: Why were the polymers P1 and P2 washed in a Soxhlet extraction apparatus with acetone?
data.answer: To remove low molecular weight polymer and impurities, ensuring purity.

data.question: Is the glass transition temperature of polymers P1 and P2 provided in the data?
Does the synthesis of polymer P2 involve a statistical copolymerization process?
Is the yield of 2-alkyl-4,7-dibromobenzotriazole 3 higher than 50%?
Was the 1-alkylated isomer of 4,7-dibromobenzotriazole also isolated during the synthesis?
Is the molecular weight of polymer P1 higher than that of P2?
Was Pd(PPh3)4 used as a catalyst in the synthesis of polymers P1 and P2?
Is the electron mobility of polymer P2 higher than that of P1?
What is the role of diisopropyl azodicarboxylate in the synthesis of 2-alkyl-4,7-dibromobenzotriazole 3?
data.answer: It acts as a reagent in the Mitsunobu reaction for the alkylation process.

data.question: Why was the polymer solution passed through a short plug of silica gel during the purification of P1?
data.answer: To remove any residual catalyst or low molecular weight species.

data.question: What was the purpose of using a double-layer lift-off process in OFET fabrication?
data.answer: To pattern the Au source/drain electrodes accurately.

data.question: Why was the polymer solution dropped into stirring MeOH during the work-up procedure for P1 and P2?
data.answer: To precipitate the polymer, facilitating its recovery and purification.

data.question: What was the purpose of using a dry nitrogen glovebox for OFET characterization?
data.answer: To prevent moisture and oxygen from affecting the measurements.
